author: gnodet
msg: ARIES-576 Fix the grace period support that I broke by accidentally leaving in my workaround so I didn't have to wait 5 minutes to see if my fix worked.

author: gnodet
msg: ARIES-576 move the call to getMissingDependencies so it occurs prior to cleanup of ReferenceRecepies. The previous position occurred after the ReferenceRecepies had been stopped
so they all reported themselves as missing, even if they had not been missing.

author: mahrwald
msg: ARIES-578: More lifecycle fixes for component level metadata. Also, one fix for registering interceptors correctly for bundle wide transaction configuration.

author: xuhaihong
msg: GERONIMO-5816 Now in OpenEJB, it treats sessionContext and messageContext from callback methods as normal resource-env injections, think we should not remove those reference types in unmap method, or those injections will be lost
